price: Não invocam, além dEle, senão divindades femininas, e não invocam senão um rebelde Satã!
arabic: إِن يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثٗا وَإِن يَدۡعُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَٰنٗا مَّرِيدٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: in yadʿūna min dūnihi illā ināthan wa-in yadʿūna illā shayṭānan marīdan
